channel.title: James Cameron on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in James Cameron on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘Avatar: Fire & Ash’ Trailer Officially Released Online: James Cameron Returns With Fiery Stunner
item.description: The follow-up to ‘The Way of Water’ teases a spectacular epic that includes volcano fights, family tragedy and intense action. Fan reactions are over the top: “Yup, another billion to James Cameron.”

item.title: Billie Eilish Reveals 3D Collaboration With James Cameron Is in the Works
item.description: The Grammy winner’s unknown project with the Oscar-winning director is currently underway.
